name: Classic Air Strike Pro
description: If you ever dream to sit in the cockpit and fly the Heli fighter then this is the game where you are able to fly fighters  with in the air. This game has the most realistic 3D graphics, smooth and easy controls and realistic sounds. Fly your heli like the hornet and enjoy the beautiful scenery while sitting in the cockpit. Flying  fighter is the aircraft game where you not only learn to fly but also you will become the ace in unlimited games. Unleash your fear learn to fly heli and become the professional pilot. So sit in your heli cockpit, start the heli and conquer the skies to destroy your opponent basses and camps.
